bookmarks.linkValidation: Link must have a URL (website address).

dashboard.credit: CaretTab| is designed and coded by |BlueCaret| and is licensed under the |MIT License|.
dashboard.needHelp: If you need help or have a suggestion you can contact the developer, |BlueCaret| on Twitter |@BlueCaret| or view CaretTab on |GitHub|.
dashboard.supportDev: Support CaretTab by tipping the developer!

design.customFontDesc: Enter the name of a locally installed font. You must install the font on your computer for it to work.
design.customFontUsage: To use a custom font, you must type the font name exactly. Custom fonts must be |installed locally on your computer|. You can get more fonts from |Google Fonts| or from |1001 Free Fonts|.
design.dontSync: Custom images do not sync across computers.
design.dynScaleDesc: Dynamic scaling allows you to change the size of elements based on the width of your browser. Disable to keep the size the same no matter the size of your browser.
design.fontWeightDesc: Select a font weight for your custom font. Some fonts do not support all weights.
design.getMorePatterns: Get more patterns at |Transparent Textures| or |Toptal|.
design.globalSizeDesc: Adjust the size of all elements.
design.hardToSee: Image too hard to see? Try changing the filter.
